title: Apogee AE-12 Dual 18in Concert Subwoofer
item_description:
Apogee AE-12 Dual 18in Concert Subwoofer

  • Apogee AE-12 dual 18in subwoofer

  • Format: Single-amped/Electronically-coupled

  • Dispersion: Omni-directional

  • Frequency Response (1m on axis): 30 Hz to 105 Hz Â± 3 dB

  • Max. SPL (@1m): 132 dB cont./138 dB peak

  • PTML (peak transient mechanical limit): 145 dB

  • Sensitivity (1W @ 1m): 101 dB/20 Hz to 100 Hz

  • Nominal Impedance: 8 ohms, each driver; separate connections to each driver

  • Max. Power Handling: 1200W cont./4800W peak (600W cont./2400W peak, each driver)

  • Dimensions: 44.75"(1137mm) W x 30"(762mm) H x 22.5"(572mm) D

  • Weight: 204 lb (92.6 kg)
